job_title: Java Developer with Actimize Suite exp
jd: Hello Folks, (Must have strong exp with Actimize, Springboot, Microservices) - Actimize is Must Note itHope you all are doing good.Please go through the Job description and let me know your interest. Title: Java Developer with Actimize Suite expLocation: Broadway, NY (Day 1 Onsite)Duration: 12+ Months contractExperience:Skills Required – 3-5 years of appropriate technical experience - Actimize Suite (RCM Customization) Should be able to develop automation scripts once the case is created in Actimize. Knowledge of RCM suite and customization Proficiency in RCM Development - Alert Types, Views, DART, Workflows, Administration Proficiency with RCM Plugin Development & Actimize scheduler Strong understanding of Linux infrastructure – Hands on experience working on Core Java Strong Database skills including SQL, procedures and query tuning - Service Design Concepts, OO and Functional Development concepts Strong oral and written communication skills Excellent interpersonal skills and professional approach - Analytical & Self-Starter Familiarity with financial market data Skills Desired - Web Services, XML, REST, SOAP, JSON, Perl - Read and create UML diagrams - Linux and Shell Scripts
